items.title: VI Live: Manchester United dicht bij vroeg doelpunt tegen City
items.summary: Zaterdagmiddag staan er niet alleen vijf wedstrijden in de Eredivisie op het programma, maar ook in het buitenland staan ons veel mooie potjes te wachten. Te beginnen met de Manchester Derby, gevolgd door onder meer Real Madrid, Liverpool, Arsenal, Bayern M√ºnchen en Internazionale. Volg het (inter)nationale voetbal in deze VI Live.

items.title: Manchester United v Manchester City: Premier League ‚Äì live
items.summary: ‚öΩ Premier League updates from the 12.30pm GMT kick-off ‚öΩ Live scores | Latest table | And follow us over on Bluesky Michael Carrick is the first manager of United or City to begin a spell in charge with a Manchester derby. This is how Man Utd‚Äôs post-Fergie managers fared in their first derby; all were Premier League games. David Moyes 1-4 (A) 2013-14 Louis van Gaal 0-1 (A) 2014-15 Jose Mourinho 1-2 (H) 2016-17 Ole Gunnar Solskjaer 0-2 (H) 2018-19 Ralf Rangnick 1-4 (A) 2021-22 Erik ten Hag 3-6 (A) 2022-23 Ruben Amorim 2-1 (A) 2024-25 [On Man Utd‚Äôs tactics] No, I don‚Äôt know. They could play with a four or a back five; they could play with a false nine or Mbeumo up front. I‚Äôd love to know but we have to focus on ourselves. [On the importance Rodri‚Äôs return] It‚Äôs not news! He‚Äôs so important. He was out for a long time, then he had a setback. We‚Äôre trying to manage his recovery. Continue reading...

items.title: Utrecht, Groningen en Eagles informeren bij Ajax naar Edvardsen
items.summary: De interesse in Oliver Edvardsen komt langzaam op gang. Vanuit de Eredivisie hebben FC Utrecht, FC Groningen en Go Ahead Eagles navraag gedaan naar de Noorse aanvaller van Ajax. Zij kregen te horen dat Edvardsen op dit moment niet te huur is.

items.title: Guehi set for medical before ¬£20m Man City move
items.summary: Crystal Palace defender Marc Guehi is set to have a medical at Manchester City on Sunday before completing a ¬£20m move.

items.title: Sources: Miami eyeing Berterame in $15M deal
items.summary: Inter Miami is prepared to pay the $15 million release clause for Monterrey forward Germ√°n Berterame, sources told ESPN.

items.title: USMNT's Sargent banished to Norwich U21s
items.summary: Norwich City manager Philippe Clement revealed that USMNT striker Josh Sargent has been sent to play with the club's under-21s following his refusal to take part in last weekend's FA Cup match against Walsall.

items.title: Mainoo handed first PL start of season by Carrick
items.summary: Kobbie Mainoo has been handed his first Premier League start of the season by Manchester United interim boss Michael Carrick for the visit of Manchester City

items.title: Transfer request from teen starlet stuns Bar√ßa
items.summary: Barcelona have been left stunned after teenager Dro Fern√°ndez informed the club of his desire to leave this January by exercising his ‚Ç¨6 million ($7m) release clause, sources have told ESPN.

items.title: Zirkzee loopt blessure op, maar mag nog steeds hopen op AS Roma
items.summary: Joshua Zirkzee maakt geen deel uit van de wedstrijdselectie van Manchester United voor de thuiswedstrijd tegen Manchester City. De spits kampt met een blessure en is een paar weken uitgeschakeld, maar er speelt meer.

items.title: Doelpunten verwacht bij NAC-NEC: 'Deur staat wagenwijd open'
items.summary: Zaterdag staan NAC Breda en NEC Nijmegen tegenover elkaar in het Rat Verlegh stadion en cijferman Bart Frouws verwacht dat het publiek kan rekenen op doelpunten.

items.title: Premier League live updates: Man United host Man City in first game under Carrick
FC Eindhoven huurt middenvelder van Go Ahead Eagles
items.summary: De winterse transfermarkt is geopend. In dit blog vind je alle speculaties en bevestigde transfers in Nederland. Bekijk hier ons blog voor de transferperikelen in het buitenland.

items.title: Ipswich lead; Coventry trail Leicester! | EFL on Sky LIVE!
Manager of women‚Äôs football club banned for 12 years after bombarding players with indecent images
items.summary: FA finds 23 of 24 charges against Ryan Hamilton were proven Punishment sends ‚Äòa clear message‚Äô misconduct ‚Äònot tolerated‚Äô The former manager of a fourth-tier women‚Äôs football club has been banned from all football for 12 years after he sent indecent images of himself to players and a member of staff as well as subjecting them to sexually inappropriate behaviour. Ryan Hamilton, who left his role as Sutton Coldfield Town Women‚Äôs manager in November 2024, was found by the Football Association to have sent photographs of his penis to a player and a staff member via social media, as well as sending naked or partially naked photographs of himself to two of the other players, and sending a player a video of himself masturbating. Continue reading...

items.title: Man City agree personal terms with Guehi as move nears completion
items.summary: Manchester City have agreed personal terms with Marc Guehi, and his move from Crystal Palace could be completed by the end of the weekend.

items.title: Shamsi celebrates wicket... with a magic trick?!
items.summary: Tabraiz Shamsi had an unusual style of celebration when he took a wicket in Adelaide Strikers' win over Melbourne Renegades in the Big Bash League.

items.title: 'We can play for two titles' - Rohl eyes Rangers double after cup rout
items.summary: Danny Rohl has targeted a league and cup double after Bojan Miovski's hat-trick helped a much-changed Rangers side to a 5-0 Scottish Cup win over Annan Athletic at Ibrox.

items.title: Tractor Girls‚Äô small army plough on in FA Cup after major off-field overhaul
items.summary: Ipswich may be bottom of WSL2, but have big plans as new management team aim to turn their season around Ipswich Town go into their Women‚Äôs FA Cup tie on Sunday against fellow WSL2 side Sheffield United with the pressure off and spirits high. The Tractor Girls are having a tough debut season in the second tier in the WSL era of women‚Äôs domestic football. They are bottom of the league, five points behind Portsmouth and Durham, with Portsmouth having played a game more. They return to their former Felixstowe home on Sunday for the FA Cup fourth round, having had to make the switch to Colchester to meet the WSL2 ground requirements for league matches. Continue reading...

items.title: England's Parry one shot off halfway lead in Hawaii
items.summary: A late dropped shot left England's John Parry one shot off the halfway lead in the PGA Tour season-opening Sony Open in Hawaii.

items.title: 'Results, results' - how Guardiola outlasted five Man Utd bosses
items.summary: Pep Guardiola takes on a sixth different Manchester United boss in Saturday's derby as he approaches a decade at City, but how has he outlasted all of those before Michael Carrick?
